description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Rambles in Galloway: topographical, historical, traditional, and biographical. ... With illustrations ... by Faed, etc" Author: HARPER, Malcolm McLachlan. Contributor: Faed, John Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10370.bb.23." Page: 159 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1876 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001598527 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here. Following this or the link above will take you to the British Library's integrated catalogue.
